title: Rito, I am in a state of despair.
body: Rito, the ⭐LIMITED EDITION Red Holiday Poro Sweatshirt (Unisex) in your "Riot Merchandise> Hoodies and Jackets" section appears to be "Retired." I would greatly appreciate it if you would allow me to purchase one, because I know that you have more; don't you dare lie to me. So, due to this current situation that I have been presented with, I drew myself wearing the said ⭐LIMITED EDITION Red Holiday Poro Sweatshirt (Unisex) in your "Riot Merchandise> Hoodies and Jackets" section in hopes of you allowing be to purchase one. I hope you take my message, and my quality art piece, into consideration this Christmas, thank you. {{sticker:sg-soraka}} rito pls.

replies.body:
Oh poro, how I wish we had more of those sweaters since I myself was not even fast enough DX!!!

It looks like the merch store sold out heckin' quick. I'm assuming people really liked that red way more than the blue. Luckily that blue one was still available!

>
> Oh poro, how I wish we had more of those sweaters since I myself was not even fast enough DX!!!

> It looks like the merch store sold out heckin' quick. I'm assuming people really liked that red way more than the blue. Luckily that blue one was still available!

Just turn on colorblind mode?
I....I can't even with this comment xD
{{item:3070}} Looks like I'll have to settle for second DX
